MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:23am. Our engineers have arrived at the Gardiner Road substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:02pm on Friday, 05 February 2021
